name: Guy Griffiths
body:
### About
I currently work at the @Reading-eScience-Centre, developing Java applications for visualising multi-dimensional environmental data.  More information can be found on our [website](http://www.resc.reading.ac.uk) or our [YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCY_UykPiXk8wZx8Gr4C8W6Q).

I have around 6 years experience of developing software in Java in both industry and academia.  I also have extensive experience of using python and Fortran.

### Personal
I have a personal life, but there is a very good chance that little of it is any of your business, this being a minimal website just so I have a better presence on github...

Of course if my personal life is in any way your business, I'm sure you'll be aware of a better way of contacting me :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
